title: Is my battery drainage on Pixel 3 normal? Battery usually lasts 18 hours with 2.5 hours of SOT.
content: I've been reading many people are getting through 22-24 hours on a single charge on their Pixel 3 with over 4 or 5 hours of screen on time. I've calculated that standby usually ticks around 1-2% per hour on average. I know it's not a huge battery. I'm only hustling though 18 hours with 2.5 hours SOT. Is this below what it should be? Would a pixel 3a be a good upgrade for battery if I'm a bit paranoid about it? Here's some screenshots
